content: trinket bowl yarn dmc senso microfiber cotton 150yds/137m per 43g/1 52oz skein 60% cotton/40% acrylic thread size 3 hook c2/2 5mm measurements yarn requirement 1oz or less gauge 6 double_crochet × 3 row = 1 × 1 size 3 5 diameter 0 75 height stitches st st chain double_crochet shell pattern chain 5 join with slip_stitch in first chain to make ring round 1 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet now and throughout 11 double_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch to top of first double_crochet 12 double_crochet round 2 chain 4 counts as first double_crochet and chain-1 space now and throughout double_crochet in same st 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet * double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to top of first double_crochet 24 double_crochet and 6 chain-1 space round 3 chain 4 double_crochet in same chain-1 space double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet * double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to top of first double_crochet 36 double_crochet and 6 chain-1 space round 4 chain 4 double_crochet in same chain-1 space double_crochet in next 6 double_crochet * double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space double_crochet in next 6 double_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to top of first double_crochet 48 double_crochet and 6 chain-1 space round 5 chain 4 double_crochet in same chain-1 space double_crochet in next 8 double_crochet * double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space double_crochet in next 8 double_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to top of first double_crochet 60 double_crochet and 6 chain-1 space round 6 chain 3 double_crochet in same chain-1 space double_crochet in next 10 double_crochet * 2 double_crochet in next chain-1 space double_crochet in next 10 double_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to top of first double_crochet 72 double_crochet round 7 chain 3 2 double_crochet in same st * skip next 2 double_crochet single_crochet in next double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet 5 double_crochet in next double_crochet shell made repeat from * 10 times around skip next 2 double_crochet single_crochet in next double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in beginning st join with slip_stitch to top of first double_crochet 12 shells finish off and weave in ends © t bailey 2008 all rights reserved
